name: AS_GCM_AIRuleBuilderFeatureEnabled_v1_default
sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: Use AI to create rules that determine which clauses to include or exclude in a clause set.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: The AI feature will be enabled by default.

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS: 
1. Replace true with false if the AI feature should be disabled
2. the value of this expression should only be one of the two available below
{true,false}

EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean with the value of true or false

TITLE: Enable/Disable AI Rule Builder

*/
true
